title: python setup.py build_deps develop recomp doesn't work on Windows
body_html:
When I do it, the install step fails with:

Cannot delete 'torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd': Access denied

Ostensibly, the problem is that Python has this file open, and on Windows you can't delete files if another application is holding on to it.

A hacky workaround is to delete all pyd files in torch before rebuilding.
body_text:
When I do it, the install step fails with:
Cannot delete 'torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd': Access denied

Ostensibly, the problem is that Python has this file open, and on Windows you can't delete files if another application is holding on to it.
A hacky workaround is to delete all pyd files in torch before rebuilding.
body:
When I do it, the install step fails with:

```
Cannot delete 'torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd': Access denied
```

Ostensibly, the problem is that Python has this file open, and on Windows you can't delete files if another application is holding on to it.

A hacky workaround is to delete all pyd files in torch before rebuilding.
